Orlando Population, 1900-1950

Year Total Population White Population "Negro" Population % "Negro"
1900 2481 ---- ---- ----
1910 3894 2113 1416 36.4
1920 9282 5530 2532 27.3
1930 27,235 18,520 7585 27.9
1940 35,735 25,303 10,470 29.3
1950 73,167 57,493 15,630 21.4

*In 1950, the U.S. Census Bureau changed the language from “Negro” to “Non-White.”
